text: If you like DC, this is a cool place to have a drink and take a look.  They have a store selling figures, t-shirts and other DC character merchandise, but everything is overprice and mediocre , like all novelty cafes.

photos: [{'src': 'https://s3-media0.fl.yelpcdn.com/bphoto/IskqLY-CNxnUX1qxX2QVqg/180s.jpg', 'link': '/biz_photos/dc-comics-super-heroes-cafe-singapore?reviewid=EgwMBQ2PaVCVk21wN-m9bA&select=IskqLY-CNxnUX1qxX2QVqg', 'altText': 'Photo of DC Comics Super Heroes Cafe - Singapore, Singapore', 'width': 180, 'height': 180, 'caption': None}, {'src': 'https://s3-media0.fl.yelpcdn.com/bphoto/J8zoUkaZdOHExDlf1xSf5Q/180s.jpg', 'link': '/biz_photos/dc-comics-super-heroes-cafe-singapore?reviewid=EgwMBQ2PaVCVk21wN-m9bA&select=J8zoUkaZdOHExDlf1xSf5Q', 'altText': 'Photo of DC Comics Super Heroes Cafe - Singapore, Singapore', 'width': 180, 'height': 180, 'caption': None}, {'src': 'https://s3-media0.fl.yelpcdn.com/bphoto/wECs5j3DmRzd87HSJleIAg/180s.jpg', 'link': '/biz_photos/dc-comics-super-heroes-cafe-singapore?reviewid=EgwMBQ2PaVCVk21wN-m9bA&select=wECs5j3DmRzd87HSJleIAg', 'altText': 'Photo of DC Comics Super Heroes Cafe - Singapore, Singapore', 'width': 180, 'height': 180, 'caption': None}, {'src': 'https://s3-media0.fl.yelpcdn.com/bphoto/uugjTXxecbtohTXj00w86A/180s.jpg', 'link': '/biz_photos/dc-comics-super-heroes-cafe-singapore?reviewid=EgwMBQ2PaVCVk21wN-m9bA&select=uugjTXxecbtohTXj00w86A', 'altText': 'Photo of DC Comics Super Heroes Cafe - Singapore, Singapore', 'width': 180, 'height': 180, 'caption': None}]
text: The place looked great with lots of cartoon character figures around. I was shown to a chosen table which I later found that the chair had oily stains on.<br><br>Quite a lot of choices on the menu. Prices were more on the high sides. <br><br>Wonder Woman&#39;s Box Office Power Drink ($10.90++)<br>An ice-blended beverage created with all-time favourite salted caramel popcorn flavour<br>The drink was quite sweet and lacking of the popcorn taste which one was expecting. Instead it tasted more like oreo cookie. Maybe it should have a change of description.<br><br>Paradise Island Mac &amp; Cheese  (S$18.90++)<br>Conchiglie rigate baked in special 5 cheese  sauce and mentaiko sauce, flavoured with white button mushrooms , turkey  bacon and garlic<br>My first choice was pancake but I was informed it was not available more than 10 minutes after I had placed my order. The pasta was well cooked and flavourful, although one could not taste the 5 distinct taste of cheese nor the pollack roe which was commonly found in mentaiko sauce. The dish itself was a tab dry. Didn&#39;t really found any garlic, but there was shrimps in it. Needed another change of description here.

Hot dog', 'width': 180, 'height': 180, 'caption': 'Hot dog'}]
text: This place isn&#39;t somewhere you&#39;d come for the food, but for the DC comics theme.  My sister is a fan, so we decided to come here for a meal.  Everything here fits the super heroes theme;  the restaurant interior, the menu, the food items.<br><br>Regarding the food, passable but not great.  Prices are ridiculous.  Even a refill for tea costs money.<br><br>Not worth the price or time to eat here.  And the staff here aren&#39;t very helpful.

text: I REALLY wanted to love this place. Maybe I&#39;m just jaded and over-bombarded by photos of cutesy foods on social media, but this place just came across as underwhelming. It was a nice place to chill, have coffee and dessert, peruse the merchandise.

text: The desserts and coffees are beautiful, but expensive and not quite as tasty as they look. Cafe is more of a photo opportunity than a place to have dessert.

text: When in Singapore with kids, how can you not go to a super heroes dining when it just stands out and magically luring your kids to the 3rd floor from the ground floor. I was elated they had a Vegetarian which is just veggie quesadilla and came burnt.<br>Go once for the kids, your on vacation! Don&#39;t expect stellar food, but go for the ambiance and make the kids happy.

photos: [{'src': 'https://s3-media0.fl.yelpcdn.com/bphoto/Xo3I7mSRdfj36i0jHGJCPA/180s.jpg', 'link': '/biz_photos/dc-comics-super-heroes-cafe-singapore?reviewid=pB6NuOzBBI7_OHfqlsWT4g&select=Xo3I7mSRdfj36i0jHGJCPA', 'altText': 'Photo of DC Comics Super Heroes Cafe - Singapore, Singapore', 'width': 180, 'height': 180, 'caption': None}, {'src': 'https://s3-media0.fl.yelpcdn.com/bphoto/Cjf0hUYYn2qnkWIZYRlA0Q/180s.jpg', 'link': '/biz_photos/dc-comics-super-heroes-cafe-singapore?reviewid=pB6NuOzBBI7_OHfqlsWT4g&select=Cjf0hUYYn2qnkWIZYRlA0Q', 'altText': 'Photo of DC Comics Super Heroes Cafe - Singapore, Singapore', 'width': 180, 'height': 180, 'caption': None}, {'src': 'https://s3-media0.fl.yelpcdn.com/bphoto/h1vKvGsnFJCUyf1cQ92eDQ/180s.jpg', 'link': '/biz_photos/dc-comics-super-heroes-cafe-singapore?reviewid=pB6NuOzBBI7_OHfqlsWT4g&select=h1vKvGsnFJCUyf1cQ92eDQ', 'altText': 'Photo of DC Comics Super Heroes Cafe - Singapore, Singapore', 'width': 180, 'height': 180, 'caption': None}]
text: The DC cafe has fantastic themed decor and menu items. There&#39;s a LOT of options to choose from and it&#39;s a cool place to look around if you&#39;re into the comics/movies, and they have a lot of neat replicas. <br><br>I got a chocolate themed drink (don&#39;t remember the name) that was a chocolate OVERLOAD. It was chocolate ice cream with gobs of nuetella, chocolate syrup, toasted marshmallow and whipped cream topping. <br><br>It sounds really good, but the chocolate they used tasted so artificial that it ruined the drink for me. I usually don&#39;t have high expectations for novelty drinks, but it was really hard to even drink the fake chocolate taste. <br><br>The service was also very, very slow. There was no one in the cafe but we had to wait 20 mins at the cashier for someone to see to us. It seemed like the staff was avoiding us at one point. <br><br>The concept of the store is cool, but I would suggest going for a simpler drink if you want to visit.

The dark knight burger, hawkerman sandwich, prawn spears, and the flash milkshake', 'width': 300, 'height': 300, 'caption': 'The dark knight burger, hawkerman sandwich, prawn spears, and the flash milkshake'}, {'src': 'https://s3-media0.fl.yelpcdn.com/bphoto/UezXJCysweR8Y6OZO9jgNg/300s.jpg', 'link': '/biz_photos/dc-comics-super-heroes-cafe-singapore?reviewid=fW614ah69XjpmBGTOY-1ug&select=UezXJCysweR8Y6OZO9jgNg', 'altText': 'Photo of DC Comics Super Heroes Cafe - Singapore, Singapore. Menu', 'width': 300, 'height': 300, 'caption': 'Menu'}]
text: I&#39;m a sucker for themed cafes, so of course I ended up at this place. It&#39;s located in the marina bay sands shoppes building, right near the exit to the art science museum. They have a pretty interesting menu and lots of items are cutely decorated to keep up with the superhero theme! The taste of the food was pretty good, but the cost was on the steeper end probably due to the decor put into it. I really enjoyed the flash drink, which is basically a strawberry milkshake. <br><br>Service here is very slow and kind of weird. We were warmly welcomed but ordering, waiting for the food, and getting the check were definitely a process. If you come here, do not expect quick or efficient service. Other than that, worth checking out for the theme and experience!
Cool cafe, it has a great atmosphere with cool food options. We got some ice cream here.

Cappuccino', 'width': 180, 'height': 180, 'caption': 'Cappuccino'}]
text: Finally got the chance to try out this cafe! Their menu was really nicely designed. A lot of choices you could choose from. There is alcoholic range too. Desserts wise are good. Their coffee are smelling nice and taste good too. Their side snacks are quite a range too. We ordered their truffles fries and it was good.  And for their dessert we ordered their waffles. It was decorated beautifully. Makes us really happy. Beside their cafe, they have a retail shop selling the DC characters products ranging from clothing to accessories. Their service isn&#39;t good enough. Their staffs wasn&#39;t attention to us. We have to keep signalling to them. Didn&#39;t try out their main dishes yet but definitely still will visit again next time.

userinfo: {'link': '/user_details?userid=L0-264Troy7Pcv2my5eBFw', 'src': 'https://s3-media0.fl.yelpcdn.com/photo/KaW0kzvmV5uLmNSenyaiEQ/60s.jpg', 'srcSet': 'https://s3-media0.fl.yelpcdn.com/photo/KaW0kzvmV5uLmNSenyaiEQ/ms.jpg 1.67x,https://s3-media0.fl.yelpcdn.com/photo/KaW0kzvmV5uLmNSenyaiEQ/120s.jpg 2.00x,https://s3-media0.fl.yelpcdn.com/photo/KaW0kzvmV5uLmNSenyaiEQ/90s.jpg 1.50x,https://s3-media0.fl.yelpcdn.com/photo/KaW0kzvmV5uLmNSenyaiEQ/168s.jpg 2.80x,https://s3-media0.fl.yelpcdn.com/photo/KaW0kzvmV5uLmNSenyaiEQ/180s.jpg 3.00x', 'markupDisplayName': 'Lynn C.', 'displayLocation': 'San Jose, CA', 'altText': 'Lynn C.', 'userUrl': '/user_details?userid=L0-264Troy7Pcv2my5eBFw', 'partnerAlias': None, 'friendCount': 328, 'photoCount': 12, 'reviewCount': 343, 'eliteYear': None}
text: Just cruising around in the mall....and what do we have here? OK, we really should&#39;ve gone looking for a restaurant that was more Singaporean (is that a word?) but instead we landed here. The first thing we stopped at was the cute store, loaded with fun DC super heroes stuff. Then we decided we were hungry. There was a small wait and you had to pay for water (which was weird, since it was the first time we had to pay for water since we landed a week earlier). <br><br>Still, loved the DC integrations into all the food and drink items. The alcoholic drink items tended to land on the sweet side which made it difficult to drink. Still, the drinks were pretty stiff anyway. Got my friend to drink two and he was VERY happy. <br><br>I ordered the Green Lantern burger, complete with the symbol on the bun. It had chicken with chunks of shrimp and crab meat sauce all over it. UGHHH it was great. The portion was so large that I had to take most of it home. We also got complimentary chips &amp; salsa since we had to wait long (although....with the drinks, we didn&#39;t think we waited long at all). Service was pretty great and there is tons of stuff to buy and fill your Super Hero needs.<br><br>Clearly, there are cheaper places to eat but this place is a fun one. And you can take a picture with Wonder Woman.

Absolutely horrible. <br><br>Came in and was greeted with a I-could-not-care-less attitude. The whole purpose of those cafes are the concept and the deco. When I stopped to take a photo before I was seated, my Friend noticed that the waitress let out a sigh of impatience. It&#39;s 615 on a weekday and the place only had a few tables taken - there were plenty of empty seats. <br><br>Sat down ordered 2 drinks off the menu and a glass of ice water. For food, two cakes and one portion of truffle fries. After 5 mins, was told that two cakes are not available. Friend asked to see the menu and waiter said ok, but never came back.<br><br>Two strawberry coolers came when we just ordered one. Fries came. At least the fries were good, hence the single star for this place. <br><br>After a while, we reminded the waitress of our order of a drink and water which has not come. The waitress looked at me as if I was stupid and said - we don&#39;t serve ice water here.<br><br>Seriously now... <br><br>So I just ordered mineral water with ice.... But after 5 mins or so, a glass of ice water came. Friend was a bit frighten to drink the unidentified looking water.... <br><br>Have not paid yet. Typing this here and hopefully the paying experience itself won&#39;t require me to update this already nasty review even more....

text: Super Heroes Cafe is THE foremost tourist trap in the entire city-state of Singapore. Aside from the food, the lackluster service, and the unfavourable price-to-serving ratio, the biggest tragedy here is the damage this place does to the brand itself.<br><br>Don&#39;t do it.

text: When I was walking around the mall and I saw this restaurant, The little girl inside me fluttered over. The decor inside is beautiful and amazing. I was seated and that&#39;s about as far as the &#34;good part&#34; of my experience went. The service was so out of wack. I was asking for suggestions and nothing. Anyways I ordered a burger for dinner that was pretty good. My biggest disappointment was with dessert. I asked for one of the desserts and the server told me that I had to walk over to the bakery next door to see if they had it? Anyways at some point a manager came over and cleared it all up. Service is very much needed at this location.

text: I was hoping this would be like going to a themed restaurant in Tokyo but it was a bit of a disappointment. The food prices were high and the excitement factor was not there. I must say that we are not particularly superhero fans. We just like themed restaurants.
